Edit: Posted an updated index page and main css file.

item.title: Dark Age - Two Page Release
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:5, topic:517764”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=636031.msg4287991#msg4287991 date=1366706461]
Is there a reason you load 3 different versions of jQuery? What about the random breaks between sections? Use margins/padding to accomplish the same thing!
[/quote]
Fixed it up.[/quote]
Still not quite doing it correct… Ids should be unique, meaning they’re used only once on the page. You should also just apply margins/padding directly to content/imageSlider/imageBanner/footer

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Age - Two Page Release
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I just thought I’d release it since I basically have no use for it right now. This includes only 2 pages. Tell me what you guys think. Yea, I know the images are from RuneScape, but I only used them for placeholders.

Do not remove the ‘Design by RSPSDesigns’ from the copyright footer.

Image:

HTML Code:

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

	<head>
		<title>3lv3n Snip3r Template - Home</title>
		<link href="css/main.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="css/navigation.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="css/fonts.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="css/smoothDivScroll.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.8.1/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery-ui-1.8.23.custom.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.mousewheel.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.kinetic.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.smoothdivscroll-1.3-min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript">
			$(document).ready(function () {
				$(".imageSlider").smoothDivScroll({
					mousewheelScrolling: "allDirections",
					manualContinuousScrolling: true,
					autoScrollingMode: "onStart"
				});
			});
		</script>
	</head>

	<body>
		<div class="imageBanner"></div>
		<nav>
			<ul>
				<li><a href="index.html" class="active">Home</a></li>
				<li><a href="forum/">Forum</a></li>
				<li><a href="game.html">Play Now</a></li>
				<li><a href="highscores/">Highscores</a></li>
				<li><a href="downloads.html">Downloads</a></li>
				<li><a href="membership.html">Membership</a></li>
				<li><a href="media.html">Media</a></li>
			</ul>
		</nav>
		<div class="imageSlider">
			<img src="img/slideshow/img_1.png" alt="" />
			<img src="img/slideshow/img_2.png" alt="" />
			<img src="img/slideshow/img_3.png" alt="" />
			<img src="img/slideshow/img_4.png" alt="" />
		</div>
		<div class="content">
			<div class="contentTitle">
				<h3>Welcome to ServerName</h3>
				<div class="line"></div>
			</div>
			<p>
				Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et...
			</p>
			<li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit.</li>
			<li>Aliquam tincidunt mauris eu risus.</li>
			<li>Vestibulum auctor dapibus neque.</li>
			<div class="boxes">
				<div class="boxHeader">
					Box Header
				</div>
				<div class="line"></div>
				Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et...
			</div>
			<div class="boxes">
				<div class="boxHeader">
					Box Header
				</div>
				<div class="line"></div>
				Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et...
			</div>
			<div class="boxes">
				<div class="boxHeader">
					Box Header
				</div>
				<div class="line"></div>
				Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et...
			</div>
			<div class="centeredText">
				More content coming soon.
			</div>
		</div>
	</body>

	<footer>
		<div class="footerInner">
			Design by <a href="http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=502023" target="_blank">3lv3n snip3r</a> © 2013<br />
			Server is not affiliated with <a href="http://www.runescape.com/" target="_blank">RuneScape</a>...
		</div>
	</footer>

</html>
* {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	font-family: 'Josefin Slab', Arial, sans-serif;
}

body {
	background: url('../img/bg.png');
}

.space {
	margin-top: 10px;
}

.imageBanner {
	background: url('../img/banner.png') no-repeat;
	width: 974px;
	height: 418px;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
}

.bannerBottom {
	background: url('../img/bannerBottom1.png') no-repeat;
	width: 974px;
	height: 77px;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
}

.content p {
	color: #fff;
	font-size: 110%;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.content li {
	color: #fff;
	font-size: 110%;
	margin-left: 15px;
}

.content {
	width: 950px;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0px auto;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	padding: 10px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	border-radius: 5px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.contentTitle {
	color: #fff;
	font-size: 175%;
	text-align: center;
	text-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #fff;
	font-weight: bold;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.contentTitle h3 {
	margin-top: -10px;
}

.line {
	width: 100%;
	border: 1px solid #fff;
	box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #fff;
}

footer {
	clear: both;
	color: #fff;
	background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	width: 950px;
	margin: 0px auto;
	padding: 10px;
	text-align: left;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	font-size: 100%;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	border-radius: 5px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.footerInner {
	margin: 0px auto;
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 100%;
	margin-top: -10px;
}

.footerInner a {
	color: #fff;
	text-decoration: underline;
}

.footerInner a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}

.boxes {
	float: left;
	text-align: center;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1);
	padding: 10px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	border-radius: 5px;
	width: 30%;
	height: 100%;
	margin-left: 8px;
	color: #fff;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	margin-top: 10px;
}

.centeredText {
	text-align: center;
	color: #fff;
	font-size: 110%;
}

.centeredText a {
	color: #fff;
}

.centeredText a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}

.boxHeader {
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 125%;
	text-shadow: 0px 0px 5px #fff;
}

.unit{
	float: left;
	width: 26%;
}

.imageThumb {
	margin-left: 50px;
	padding: 5px;
}

Download link: Click here
